item.title: Academic: the website designer for Hugo
item.description: Create a beautifully simple website or blog in under 10 minutes.

Computational biology. Network pharmacology. Complex systems. I work at the National Institute of Genomic Medicine in Mexico City, studying these and other problems as a member of the Cátedras CONACYT program.
